description:
You will learn the basic concept of the game within SECONDS. But as you progress further, new gameplay-elements will extend the strategic depth of the game. It will take all your wits to master all levels perfectly.

Intuitive controls and mind-bending puzzles await!

The game is featuring 96 levels of increasing difficulty.

This game makes use of the touch screen functionality only. So the menu and every puzzle can be played with touch controls only!
name: Super Glow Puzzle
intro: Super Glow Puzzle is THE new and challenging puzzle game that is easy to learn but hard to master!
